long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
idemeum is passwordless login platform for small businesses. We offer one place to manage passwords, accounts, and applications.

idemeum combines Passwordless Password Manager, Single Sign-On, Account Provisioning, and Passwordless MFA. Our platform allows businesses to eliminate passwords and secure employee access with biometrics. Instead of deploying products from separate vendors, you have one stop shop platform for login management. 

With idemeum Password Manager all your logins are encrypted using zero knowledge architecture. Only you hold the keys to decrypt data. You can easily use strong passwords and securely auto fill logins on mobile and desktop. 

With idemeum Passwordless MFA you can easily access all your business Single Sign-On applications with biometrics. No more passwords to type or remember. 

What is more, idemeum integrates with your SaaS applications to automate account provisioning and employee onboarding. 

One platform to simplify your identity management.
